data.message: My complain is that annoying messenger picture that keeps popping up when you want to inbox. You need to provide a yes or no box if ppl are interested in getting it or not, and no in not interested. The same with other apps.

replies.message:
Thanks for the suggestion, Cloty. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions please, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1o7KlhD.
-Chantal

Thank you I will take that information down right now I have a couple of things im not a comp savvy person. Didn't expect a response so fast. I love fb. Im retired and cant keep off it. My kids complain all the time. I enjoy it.
I agree the messenger is so annoying, I don't like that I can't be on Facebook and send messages at the same time like before.

I also agree. 
That messenger is totally annoying.
why dont you turn that off. Yes ., you can.
I agree also on Messenger being annoying. I like it how it was before ! Pl bring it back !
I also wish you would get rid of Messenger. I liked it better the way it was before.
Any chance you will get rid of Messenger and put it back to the way it was before?
Me too I liked messenger much better the way it was before.
